summary: SIMPLE_OPTIMIZATIONS breaks code emited by uhc's js backend

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. install uhc >= 1.1.3 2. run build (setting the CLOSURE_COMPILER environment variable to the location of compiler.jar) 3. open a browser at index.html 4. observe "Hello world" 5. in build, replace WHITESPACE_ONLY with SIMPLE_OPTIMIZATIONS 6. open a browser at index.html 7. observe type error. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I expect optimizations not to effect the output, but they do. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Closure Compiler (http://code.google.com/closure/compiler) Version: 1741 Built on: 2012/01/30 15:02 Ubuntu 11.10 Please provide any additional information below. N/A

i have no idea what UHC is. United Health Care?

would it be possible to attach the actual code you're compiling?
UHC == Utrecht Haskell Compiler. Here are the files it generates.

The Compiler only supports a subset of JavaScript:
http://code.google.com/closure/compiler/docs/limitations.html

http://code.google.com/p/closure-compiler/wiki/CompilerAssumptions

If you can be a little more specific about where the problem is we can narrow down if this is an limitation or a bug.
Issue tracking has been migrated to github. Please make any further comments on this issue through https://github.com/google/closure-compiler/issues
